name: io.fourplayers.odin
description: Our .NET (C#) SDK is available and can be used on client and server side implementing the CLR for .NET.

samples.description: Basic examples showcasing Simple Room Join, Push-to-talk, Audio 3D, ...
Full sample project using ODIN and "Photon PUN 2 Free", showcasing how to integrate positional Voice Chat, Radio Voice Chat and Environmental Audio Occlusion effects into your game.
